text: Grace is a 1918 photograph by Eric Enstrom. It depicts an old man, Charles Wilden, with hands folded, saying a prayer over a table with a simple meal. It was created in Bovey, Minnesota. In 2002, the Minnesota State Legislature established it as the state photograph. ==References== ==Other websites== *GRACE by Enstrom - Website for Photograph Category:Photographs Category:1910s works Category:1910s in art
title: Grace (photograph)
